entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as trying to find Malfoy, Crabbe, and Goyle in the midst of the chaos. He is also mentioned as being unable to see them anywhere.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is described as one of the students who were involved in banned experiments and whose secrets are being consumed by the fire. Harry is also trying to find him.

entities.name: crabbe
entities.description: Crabbe is described as one of the students who were involved in banned experiments and whose secrets are being consumed by the fire. Harry is also trying to find him.

entities.name: goyle
entities.description: Goyle is described as one of the students who were involved in banned experiments and whose secrets are being consumed by the fire. Harry is also trying to find him.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as shouting at Harry to get out of the room through the black smoke.

relationships.description: Harry is trying to find Malfoy in the midst of the chaos. This is described as Harry swooping low over the marauding monsters of flame.
Harry is trying to find Crabbe in the midst of the chaos. This is described as Harry swooping low over the marauding monsters of flame.
Harry is trying to find Goyle in the midst of the chaos. This is described as Harry swooping low over the marauding monsters of flame.
Ron is shouting at Harry to get out of the room through the black smoke. This is described as Ron bellowing 'Harry, let's get out, let's get out!'
